title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Key Hezbollah Figure: Mi’them Mustafa Al-Ter Eliminated in Air Defense Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesman:

The IDF has attacked and eliminated Mi’them Mustafa Al-Ter, a terrorist who was a significant knowledge hub in Hezbollah’s air defense array.

The IDF attacked and eliminated the terrorist Mi’them Mustafa Al-Ter using Air Force aircraft in the Baalbek area. Al-Ter was a significant knowledge center in Hezbollah’s air defense systems. He also participated in the planning and execution of various terrorist operations against the State of Israel.

Mi’them acquired his knowledge during his visits to Iran and assisted in the military buildup of Hezbollah with Iranian weapons.

The elimination represents another blow to the capabilities of Hezbollah’s air defense systems.

The Air Force will continue to operate wherever necessary, including in Lebanese airspace, to remove threats to the residents of the State of Israel and to carry out IDF missions.
